Tables.CreateScript: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[History] ([Id] BIGINT IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL, [SID] NVARCHAR (50) NOT NULL, [Value] FLOAT (53) NULL, [Quality] INT NOT NULL, [LastUpdate] DATETIME NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT [PK_History] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([Id] ASC));

Indexes.CreateScript: CREATE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_History_SID_Time] ON [dbo].[History]([SID] ASC, [LastUpdate] DESC);
